pr_title: Issue #8633: LineLengthCheck.fileExtensions default value and similar usages should be changed to empty string
pr_body:
#8633 
```
<property name="fileExtensions" type="java.lang.String[]" default-value="all files">
          <description><![CDATA[Specify file extensions that are accepted.]]></description>
 </property>
```
`all files` is not good default value. We need to fix javadoc. It is what we mean and how it will be interpreted, but it is not a value

3. Status will be READY by default, can be modified in UI by user

TodoComment - https://checkstyle.org/config_misc.html#TodoComment , so we can place "misc" tag on it.
https://checkstyle.org/config_misc.html#UncommentedMain . looks like almost all Checks in this root package should have "misc" tag, it might be good to match website grouping.
So lets support this yml file and place there some overrides ... for example Indentation. it is special java package, but group in website is "misc", so lets put tag "misc" on it. All other standard Check in root package could have "misc" tag automatically. So we will have yml in plugin and there will be only "Indentation".
All thirdparty checks (sevntu, ....)  should not fall in "misc" tag if no tags provided.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2020, 7, 1, 14, 47, 40, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'romani', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 448608390, 'comment_body': '@romani 
> and there will be only "Indentation".

I didn't understand. When specifying the IndentationCheck in yml, there will be misc tag in the config. What else are you trying to imply?

> All thirdparty checks (sevntu, ....) should not fall in "misc" tag if no tags provided.

It **should** fall in misc category by default right?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2020, 7, 1, 20, 48, 44, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gaurabdg', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 448957229, 'comment_body': 'Done', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2020, 7, 2, 12, 14, 5, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gaurabdg', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 449023018, 'comment_body': '>  What else are you trying to imply?

nothing else. in Config we will do overrides of what you determine in from package name. By package name IndentationCheck should has "indentation" tag, but by means of this yml file it will be "misc".

> It should fall in misc category by default right?
